content: meet francesca my newest crochet angel pattern designed for the christmas in july make along this charming angel stands on her own without stiffening agents making her perfect for holiday décor or gifting quick and easy to crochet francesca can be made in under an hour using medium weight yarn \ 4\ and a 4 mm g crochet hook **skill level ** easy finished size 6 inches tall not including the halo 3 inches wide when standing and measuring the diameter of the skirt **materials ** medium weight / worsted weight yarn \ 4\ 4 mm g crochet hook **pattern features ** no stiffening agents required quick to make less than an hour free pattern available enjoy crafting francesca and be sure to check out my other crochet angel designs more crochet angel patterns here https //oombawkadesigncrochet com/category/crochet-patterns-angels/ > > this pattern is available for free on > my website which is monetized by ads > if you prefer an ad-free version of > the pattern it is
